H0.text: Metz is the capital of which region of France. Alsace

H1.text: Metz is the capital of which region of France. Champagne-Ardenne

H2.text: Metz is the capital of which region of France. Franche-Comt√©

H3.text: Metz is the capital of which region of France. Lorraine

A4.text: During the 1950s, Metz was chosen to be the capital of the newly created Lorraine region.

A5.text: Metz is the prefecture of the Moselle department and the seat of the parliament of the Grand Est region.
